first.title: Free teaching tools
first.text: Free teaching resources, lesson plans and much more. You can even track your student’s progress with our class tracker.

second.title: A fun game for students
second.text: You can learn to become a coding superhero, amaze your friends with your high scores.

third.title: About Blockly
third.text: Built on ‘Blockly’, an easy-to-use visual programming language that’s similar to Scratch, so you don’t need to worry about syntax.
